response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is not just an object; it's a testament to innovation and excellence in its field. Given its unique features and unparalleled capabilities, we believe its true value exceeds $1,200,000. Considering the immense value it offers, I am extending to you an exclusive opportunity to acquire this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider this proposition carefully. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of bringing this extraordinary product into your possession.", "product_price": 950000}
